root.name: Aa! Megami-sama
root.description: OverviewAh! My Goddess (Aa! Megami-sama in the original Japanese) is an adventure game based on the manga and anime created by Kousuke Fujishima. It was originally released in 1993 for the NEC PC-9801 and was ported to the PC-FX in 1997. The PC-FX version includes voice acting among other enhancements.
